Timeline of community response to the eviction of the Red Balloon Early Childhood Learning Center

September 2022

Columbia announces plan to evict Red Balloon.

December 2022

Student protests begin against impending Red Balloon closure.

February 2023

Many state officials place pressure on Columbia to reinstate Red Balloon.

March 2023

Petition to save Red Balloon garners over 15,000 signatures. Columbia officials block its delivery into Low Library.

April 2023

Student protests continue.

June-September 2023

Columbia releases a plan to reinstate a preschool “in the spirit” of Red Balloon and to provide financial assistance to former Red Balloon parents.

February 2024

Columbia delays the opening of the new center past its original deadline of September 2024.

Source: Spectator reporting

Graphic by Kyara Torres-Olivares

Illustrations by Julian Michaud
